headline: AI Software Play Synopsys Reaches 80-Plus Relative Strength Rating Benchmark; Investors Focus On Its Positive Aspects
summary: Investors apparently forgave Synopsys for an outlier quarter last year, and are focused on its sales and profit gains this year.  Synopsys stock rose further above its 21-day average Thursday, ahead of its earnings report due in early September.  Reflecting the computer software design company's strength, Synopsys stock got a positive improvement to its Relative Strength (RS) Rating on Thursday, with an increase from 80 to 84.
